welcomeText1: Hi, I'm Lizandro Vivanco, a passionate web developer specialized in software development and Robotic Process Automation (RPA). Here you can explore some of my best projects and learn more about my work.
bioText: I am a passionate programmer with a strong interest in web development and software engineering. Over the years, I have honed my skills in various programming languages and technologies, and I am always eager to learn more.
programmerText: As a programmer, I am detail-oriented and always strive to write clean, efficient code. I enjoy problem-solving and am particularly interested in backend development and data analysis. Collaboration and continuous learning are core to my approach, and I am always excited to tackle new challenges.
1project1Desc: Created for querying data in an inventory, it uses JS, JSON and has a password for access.

3project3Desc: Automatically renames PDFs in a folder according to how it is programmed.
3project4Desc: Upgrades the FortiClient App to a new version and restores a Backup created.
3project5Desc: Automates the sending of emails through a Stored Procedure in SQL.

4project1Desc: Add comments to Google Maps sites with the help of Python and ChatGPT.
